scenarios.description: This scenario is to verify that all products have a valid category_id in the database
scenarios.test_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM products WHERE category_id IS NULL OR category_id NOT IN (SELECT category_id FROM categories)

scenarios.scenario_name: SQL Query Testing for Product and Category Relationship
scenarios.description: This scenario is to test the SQL query that retrieves all products under a specific category
scenarios.test_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM products WHERE category_id = (SELECT category_id FROM categories WHERE category_name = 'Electronics')
scenarios.error_message: ('42S22', "[42S22] [Microsoft][ODBC Driver 17 for SQL Server][SQL Server]Invalid column name 'category_name'. (207) (SQLExecDirectW)")

scenarios.scenario_name: Data Integrity Check for Category ID
scenarios.description: This scenario is to ensure the integrity of data by checking that no two products have the same category_id
scenarios.test_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM (SELECT category_id, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM products GROUP BY category_id) WHERE cnt > 1
scenarios.error_message: ('42000', "[42000] [Microsoft][ODBC Driver 17 for SQL Server][SQL Server]Incorrect syntax near the keyword 'WHERE'. (156) (SQLExecDirectW)")
